title: How to Play As a Warrior in Lord of the Rings Conquest
category_hierarchy: The Lord of the Rings: Conquest

steps.headline: Go to a mission.
steps.description: Pick either the campaign or Instant Action.

steps.headline: Press 'Y/Tringle' and 'B/Circle' for crowd breaker attacks.
steps.description: Jump with 'A/X' before using them to add more power to the hits.

steps.headline: Press 'RT/R2' to throw a knife.
steps.description: Hold the trigger, align the reticle up with an enemy, and let go to throw it.

steps.headline: Press and hold 'LB/L1' to add magical fire to your attack.

text: Go to a mission. Pick either the campaign or Instant Action. Start the mission. Pick the Warrior class. Press 'X/Square' for a slash attack.  Press 'Y/Tringle' and 'B/Circle' for crowd breaker attacks. Jump with 'A/X' before using them to add more power to the hits. Press 'RT/R2' to throw a knife. Hold the trigger, align the reticle up with an enemy, and let go to throw it. Press and hold 'LB/L1' to add magical fire to your attack.  Hold 'LT/L2' to block attacks.
